### Flexboard of NYC Restaurant Inspections
```{r include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

library(p8105.datasets)


NYC_sample = rest_inspec %>% 
  sample_n(2000)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}

cuisine_plot = NYC_sample %>% 
  select(cuisine_description, score)  %>% 
  group_by(cuisine_description) %>% 
  summarise(mean_score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(mean_score)) %>% 
  slice(1:10) %>%
  mutate(cuisine_description = str_replace(cuisine_description, "Bottled beverages, including water, sodas, juices, etc.", "Bottled Beverages")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = cuisine_description, y = mean_score)) +
    geom_point() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + labs(x = "Type of Cuisine", y = "Mean Inspection Score", title = "Cuisines With Worst Scores", caption = "Each violation adds points to the evaluation. Higher scores mean more violations.") 

cuisine_plot

```
